pages.text: Anata wa waga shirushi o kyohi shita mono o mita ka. Daga kare wa,`watashi wa tomi to shison to ni, kitto megumarerudearou.' To iu
Kare wa yugen-kai o mi todoketa no ka. Soretomo jihibukai okata no nanrakano yakusoku o eta no ka
Iya kesshite sode wanai. Ware wa kare no iu koto o kiroku shi, kare ni taisuru chobatsu o nobasudearou
Kare-ra no itte iru koto wa subete ware ga hikitori, kare wa tadaichinin de waga moto ni kurudearou
Kare-ra wa arra no soto ni kamigami o tate, kare-ra o chusai-sha ni shiyou to shite iru
Kesshite sode wanai. Kare-ra (kamigami) wa sono suhai o kyohi shi, kare-ra ni taishi teki ni narou
Kare-ra o sosonokasu tame ni, ware ga fushinjin-sha ni taishi akuma-tachi o noko wa shite iru no o anata wa kigatsukanai no ka
Dakara kare-ra ni taishi seikyudeatte wa naranai. Ware wa tadatada kare-ra no tame ni (kagira reta yuyo no hi)-su o kazoeru dakedearu
Sonohi, ware wa omo o osoreru mono o (meiyo no) shisetsu o mukaeru yo ni jihibukaki okata (no omoto) ni atsume
ware wa tsumibukaimono o,-ju no gun o mizu ni ou yo ni, jigoku ni oitateru
Jihibukaki okata kara o yurushi o eta mono no soto wa, dare mo torinasu chikara o motanaidearou
Mata kare-ra wa iu. `Jihibukaki okata wa ko o moke rareru
Tashikani anata gata wa, hidoi koto o iu monodearu
Ten wa sakeyou to shi,-chi wa warete setsusetsu ni nari, yamayama wa kuzureochiyou
Sore wa kare-ra ga, jihibukaki okata ni taishi,(ari mo shinai)-ko no na o (torinasu mono to shite) tonaeta tamedearu
Ko o moke rareru koto wa, jihibukaki okata ni wa arienai
Ten to ji ni oite, jihibukaki okata no shimo be to shite, makari denai mono wa tada no 1-ri mo nai nodearu
Hontoni kare wa, kare-ra no (subete) o keisan shi, kare-ra no kazu o kazoe rareru
Mata shinpan no hi ni wa, kare-ra wa onono hitori de kare no omoto ni makari deru
